item.title: CV
item.description: Evan Curtin, Machine Learning Engineer Chicago, IL | evanmcurtin@gmail.com | github.com/ecurtin2 SKILLS 5+ Years: Python (numpy, scipy, pandas, etc), Scientific / Mathematical Computing 2-4 Years: C++, git, Linux/bash <2 Years: Cloud Computing (Amazon Web Services), Docker, SQL EXPERIENCE Machine Learning Scientist Capital One, Chicago IL Apr 2019 - Present Kubernetes based machine learning pipelines on AWS Data Science Engineer Broadspire, Chicago IL Jun 2018 - Apr 2019

item.title: Abstract linear algebra in Python
